attributes.action: Sack Peter Mandelson from the Cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In October 2008, Peter Mandelson was made Business Secretary on the Cabinet and was granted a life peer status, earning him a position in the House of Lords, despite his murky political career.

His failure to declare his £370 000 interest-free loan resulted in his first resignation, bolstered by his ridiculous comments as the newly appointed Secretary of State for Northern Ireland in 1998. 

In recent years, serving as the UK's European Commissioner, Mandelson has insisted in a system of free-trade rather than fair-trade, damaging farmers in developing countries.

This petition asks Prime Minister Gordon Brown, to do the right thing, and sack Peter Mandelson from the Cabinet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
